page.title: 09LEISURE ACTIVITES
page.content: {ACTIVITES}There are a few activites in the villages of Easington and Skeffling.There is the W.I.,Cubs,Youth club,and Mrs Halls art classes. {YOUTH CLUB}Mr Movely runs the youth club.At the youth club they have darts,snooker,table tennis,and they have bingo on Friday evenings. {WOMENS INSTITUTE}The W.I. is the Womans Institute for the housewives of Easington.The W.I. have speakers come to speak to them.They put on displays of there talents such as cooking,sewing,knitting,embroidery,and crocheting. {CUBS}The cubs are for boys,aged 8 to 11 years.It is taken by Mrs Chapman. {PUBS}There are two Public Houses The White Horse and the Neptune,where darts and dominoes are played.On Wedensday night country music is played in the White Horse.
